title: Gender Equality and Rights in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the primary role traditionally expected of men in Timorese society?
Which factor is NOT mentioned as influencing changing gender roles in Timor-Leste?
choices: Increased access to education for women
Influence of global media and culture

questions.question: What is one of the benefits of gender equality mentioned in the module?
Which of the following is NOT considered a sexual and reproductive right?
choices: The right to make decisions about one's own body
The right to access sexual and reproductive health services
The right to force others to have children
The right to receive comprehensive sexuality education
questions.answer: The right to force others to have children

questions.question: What is one of the challenges to sexual and reproductive rights in Timor-Leste?
choices: Excessive access to services in rural areas
Lack of cultural and religious barriers
Lack of comprehensive sexuality education in schools
questions.answer: Lack of comprehensive sexuality education in schools

questions.question: What is the estimated prevalence of intimate partner violence against women in Timor-Leste?
Which organization provides counseling and safe house services for domestic violence victims in Timor-Leste?
What is one of the challenges faced by LGBTQ+ individuals in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way to promote acceptance and equality for LGBTQ+ individuals in Timor-Leste?
choices: Training for healthcare providers and educators

questions.question: What law was passed in Timor-Leste in 2010 to address domestic violence?
What is one reason domestic violence often goes unreported in Timor-Leste?
choices: Cultural attitudes viewing it as a private matter
questions.answer: Cultural attitudes viewing it as a private matter

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a form of domestic violence in the module?
What is one of the emerging trends in changing gender roles in Timor-Leste?
choices: Men taking on more domestic responsibilities
questions.answer: Men taking on more domestic responsibilities

questions.question: Which organization provides legal aid and advocacy for women in Timor-Leste?
What is the status of same-sex sexual activity in Timor-Leste?
choices: Legal and protected by anti-discrimination laws

questions.question: What is one factor contributing to the slow progress in changing traditional gender roles in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of increased gender equality in Timor-Leste?
What is one of the challenges in implementing the Law Against Domestic Violence in Timor-Leste?
Which group provides legal assistance to victims of domestic violence in Timor-Leste?
What is one way schools and communities can create a more accepting environment for LGBTQ+ individuals in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a traditional role for women in Timorese society?
What is one of the progress points mentioned regarding sexual and reproductive rights in Timor-Leste?
choices: Universal access to family planning services
Comprehensive sexuality education in all schools
National reproductive health strategy in place
Legalization of abortion in all cases
questions.answer: National reproductive health strategy in place

questions.question: Which specialized unit of the national police handles domestic violence cases in Timor-Leste?
What is one of the challenges faced by LGBTQ+ individuals in accessing healthcare in Timor-Leste?
choices: Free healthcare for all LGBTQ+ individuals

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a factor influencing changing gender roles in Timor-Leste?
What is one way men can be engaged as allies in promoting gender equality in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a sexual and reproductive right in the module?
choices: The right to choose if, when, and with whom to have sex
The right to decide whether and when to have children
The right to force others to conform to traditional gender roles
The right to access sexual and reproductive health services
questions.answer: The right to force others to conform to traditional gender roles

questions.question: What is one of the emerging trends in changing gender roles mentioned in the module?
choices: Decreased female participation in politics and leadership
Men taking on fewer domestic responsibilities

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a challenge to implementing comprehensive sexuality education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Cultural and religious barriers to discussing sexuality
questions.answer: Cultural and religious barriers to discussing sexuality

questions.question: What is one way that social media and technology are influencing attitudes towards gender roles and LGBTQ+ issues in Timor-Leste?
choices: Decreasing awareness of global gender equality movements
Providing platforms for LGBTQ+ advocacy and community building
questions.answer: Providing platforms for LGBTQ+ advocacy and community building
